title: TomTom Navigator 7.450 (9028) + United_Kingdom_and_Republic_of_I
description:
App version 7.450 (9028)
Map version United Kingdom and Republic of Ireland v720.1802
PocketGPSWorld.com Speed Camera Database Version 6.014 23 JAN 08

1)	Copy the contents of the "SD_CARD" folder to the root of the storage card
2)	Install TomTom Navigator 7 with the "TTN_7.450.9028.cab" provided
3)	Start TomTom and look up your DEVICE ID from TomTom, which can be found in the file "ttnavigator.bif" on the storage card under DeviceUniqueID
4)	Copy the "TTN7" folder which can be found in the "CRACK" folder the the root of drive C:
5)	In the "TTN7" folder right click on "Edit, Save, Open.bat" file and click Edit
6)	Where it has "XXXXX-XXXXX" enter your DEVICE ID from the "ttnavigator.bif" file
7)	Save the changes to the "Edit, Save, Open.bat" file then open it
8)	A file called "United_Kingdom_and_Republic_of_Ireland-14.meta.dct" should appear.
9)	Copy this file to the "United_Kingdom_and_Republic_of_Ireland_v720.1802" folder which can be found on the storage card
10)	Put storage card back in your PDA then run TomTom Navigator 7

Enjoy!

Tested on Acer n35 PDA and works
